https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rPNSB5rXXoVFC43eMzZ24V8D94a.jpg Ravi desperately needs money to bail out his father who has been wrongly accused and jailed. He becomes a con artist but keeps getting into trouble. Chandu saves him and they become partners in crime. All the Best
